channel.title: Comments for Seofy
channel.description: SEO, SMM & Digital Marketing Agency WordPress Theme

item.title: Comment on Search Engine Optimization by David Parker
item.dc:creator: David Parker
item.description: Great tool! I am using a redirect plugin to send all my 404’s to my home page but I think it’s slacking sometimes. I noticed that some other sites have taken over my 404’s somehow.
item.content:encoded: Great tool! I am using a redirect plugin to send all my 404’s to my home page but I think it’s slacking sometimes. I noticed that some other sites have taken over my 404’s somehow.

item.title: Comment on Social Media For Business by David Parker
item.dc:creator: David Parker
item.description: This is a useful post for finding broken links within the website, what about links pointing outwards that are broken? I can use a free web service but wondered if this was possible.
item.content:encoded: This is a useful post for finding broken links within the website, what about links pointing outwards that are broken? I can use a free web service but wondered if this was possible.
